newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: BOXING-HOLYFIELD IN S.AFRICA TO MEET MANDELA.
newsitem.headline: BOXING-HOLYFIELD IN S.AFRICA TO MEET MANDELA.

text.p: Heavyweight boxing champion Evander Holyfield arrived in South Africa on Sunday for a visit which will include a meeting with President Nelson Mandela.
Holyfield, who retained his title when challenger Mike Tyson was disqualified from their June 28 fight for biting his ears, will be in the country for five days.
He told reporters he was a Christian and had forgiven Tyson for his "mistake".
Holyfield's four-city visit will include coaching sessions with local boxers and a meeting on Monday with Mandela, who is a former amateur boxer.
